column1: Clustering is a technique that groups similar objects such that the objects in the same group are more similar to each other than the objects in the other groups.
Hierarchical clustering involves creating clusters that have a predetermined ordering from ___
In agglomerative clustering follow the ____ approach.
In complete linkage hierarchical clustering, the distance between two clusters is defined as the longest distance between two points in each cluster.
In average linkage hierarchical clustering, the distance between two clusters is defined as the average distance between each point in _______ .
column2: One cluster to every point in the other cluster
column4: One cluster to every point in the same cluster
